summary: As part of FY 2024 appropriations, members of Congress could request to designate a certain amount of funding for specific projects in their communities. While agencies often have discretion over how they award funds, Congress has directed them to distribute these funds to the designated recipients. We're tracking these funds to help ensure transparency. FY 2024 appropriations included about $14.6 billion for 8,098 projects. This...
title: Tracking the Funds: Specific Fiscal Year 2024 Provisions for Federal Agencies
